segments.text: Good morning , madam . I'd like to apply for a library card . Can you help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Please give me your ID card , a photo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you have to give me 15 dollars for the deposit . The library card is free .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Here is the money . And If I return the card , can I get the refund ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , as long as the card is well kept .
segments.speaker: S2
